actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide price support for producers of sunflower seeds through loans and purchases by the Secretary of Agriculture.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make available price supports to producers of sunflower seeds. Requires the Secretary to make available loans and purchases on the 1980 and 1981 crops at a level of not less than ten dollars per hundredweight. Prohibits the Secretary from requiring a set-aside of sunflower seed acreage as a condition to such price support.

titles.title: A bill to provide price support for producers of sunflower seeds through loans and purchases by the Secretary of Agriculture.
